body: hit me with your best shot... of questions
body_tagged: hit me with your best shot... of questions
title: Ask meh Anything?

replies.body: Would you prefer to get shot by a pink bubblegum gun or a minigun filled with Snickers bars?
replies.body_tagged: Would you prefer to get shot by a pink bubblegum gun or a minigun filled with Snickers bars?

replies.body: God Snickers are painful xD sometimes even to bite into! 'd have to say the pink bubblegum gun ^^
replies.body_tagged: God Snickers are painful xD sometimes even to bite into! 'd have to say the pink bubblegum gun ^^

replies.body:
Hmmm, how about this :
Would you rather be eaten alive by your favorite food, or have your enemy (whoever) eat you instead?
replies.body_tagged:
Hmmm, how about this :
Would you rather be eaten alive by your favorite food, or have your enemy (whoever) eat you instead?

replies.body:
Id rather chicken have roast shad364 than my enemy eat me...

I dont want to give them the satisfaction xD And I owe the chickens for eating them so much o3o

replies.body: Have you ever had bacon on pizza? If not, we will never be friends >:3
replies.body_tagged: Have you ever had bacon on pizza? If not, we will never be friends >:3

replies.body:
Oh noes ;-;

Actually Im not sure, one time at a pizza place I had a meat pizza but I don't know if it had bacon on it cx

replies.body:
What is your real life name? Hazel o3o
What is your skype? hazel.shepherd123 (tell me you're from avicus or I won't accept)
Where are you from? Im from Africa but I live in England ^^
What language do you speak? My main language is English but I dabble in Japanese and Spanish
What is your time zone? GMT ^^
When you are online? Normally Im online for 5 hours? It depends really
Would you like to be my friend? Oh yeah ^^ I wanna be everyones friend <3
Some that you can add? Im one year away from university? (its different in different countries so I'll just say that) Uhm I like anime, video games... drawing is my hobbie and I really love biology.. I love the ocean but I also love Minecraft o3o
